div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Lincoln} ss
In the Justice Court of Sprague Precinct in the County and town of aforesaid before E.G. Pendleton JP
Territory of Washington Plaintiff vs. E Romick Defendant
F.P. Waymouth being duly sworn says the crime of Grand Larceny has been committed and charged on E Romick therewith as follows to wit:

That at Sprague Lincoln County Wash Territory on to wit believes February 17th A.D. 1885 at the time of five o'clock pm and February 18th A.D. 1885 at the hour of seven o'clock am he the said E Romick defendant then and there being did unlawfully and feloniously take steal and carry away the personal property of another, took

the property of one G W Rick to wit (5000) five Thousand cigars of the value of ($325.00) Three Hundred and twenty five dollars All of which is contrary to the statutes in such ease made and provided and against the peace and arguably of the Territory of Washington
Wherefore applicant asks that a warrant may issue for the apprehension of said E. Romick defendant and that he be dealt with according to law
J P Waymouth Sworn to and subscribed before me this 26th day of February A.D. 1885. W H Smallwood Notary Public
Subscribed and sworn in before me this 27th day of February 1885. E. G. Pendleton Justice of the Peace
